Projects

A selection of my personal projects and experiments.
For my client work, get in touch! or download my CV

  • Relax.

    December 2022

    Relax, sit, and feel better.

    We spend so much time creating things that take your attention and drain your energy.

    Relax. is different — it’s designed to give you back your time and help you unwind. Take a break, clear your mind, and enjoy the moment.

    Please share it with someone who needs to slow down or experience it for yourself. You deserve it.

    Open

  • Days.

    December 2022

    Relax, sit, and feel better.

    We spend so much time creating things that take your attention and drain your energy.

    Relax. is different — it’s designed to give you back your time and help you unwind. Take a break, clear your mind, and enjoy the moment.

    Please share it with someone who needs to slow down or experience it for yourself. You deserve it.

    Open
